Query: how to format USB Flash Disk using Ubuntu terminal

Top-3 Scripts:
au_1120671: fdisk /dev/sdb
enter: n
enter: p ( primary )
enter: default -> press enter
enter: default-> press enter

enter:w ( write ) to save the changes 

if you type fdisk -l : you should see a /dev/sdb1

au_828235: sudo parted -l
sudo dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/sdX bs=512 count=1

au_96923: sudo mkdir /media/flash
sudo mount /dev/sdb1 /media/flash -o dmask=000,fmask=111

sudo mkdir /media/flash
sudo mount /dev/sdb1 /media/flash -o permissions
